resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81873</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81873</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4042</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Advice to Students on Doing Tasks and Assignments</string>
            <string language="es">Consejos para los estudiantes para hacer sus deberes y trabajos</string>
            <string language="ga">Comhairle do Mhic Léinn maidir le Tascanna a dhéanamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rat zu den Kursteilnehmern auf dem Tun von von 
Aufgaben und von von Anweisungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le conseil aux étudiants sur faire 
Charge et des affectations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conselho aos estudantes em fazer tarefas e 
atribuições</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consiglio agli allievi sul fare le mansioni e le 
assegnazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμβουλές στους σπουδαστές να κάνει τις στοιχειώδεις 
εργασίες και τις αναθέσεις</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This will help you to understand why you do tasks and assignments, how to do them well and how to get an even better mark next time round.</string>
            <string language="es">Esto les ayudará a comprender porqué hacen las tareas y los trabajos, les ayudará también a ver cómo pueden hacerlos bien y cómo conseguir una puntuación incluso mejor la próxima vez.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cabhróidh sé seo leat tuiscint a fháil ar an fáth a ndéanann tú taisc, an chaoi iad a dhéanamh níos fearr agus marc níos fearra  fháil an chéad uair eile.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LCA</string>
            <string language="es">LCA. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">ATF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses hilft Ihnen, warum Sie Aufgaben und 
Anweisungen tun, wie zu zu verstehen tun sie wohl und wie man einer 
sogar besseren Markierung folgendes Mal rund erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci vous aidera à comprendre pourquoi vous  
charge et des affectations, comment à faites-les bonnes et 
comment obtenir une marque encore meilleure la fois prochaine ronde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto ajudar-lhe-á compreender porque você faz 
tarefas e atribuições, como a os faz boa e como começar uma marca 
mesmo melhor a vez seguinte redonda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò li aiuterà a capire perchè fate le 
mansioni e le assegnazioni, come a le fa buone e come ottenere ad un 
contrassegno ancora migliore la volta prossima rotonda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό θα σας βοηθήσει για να καταλάβει γιατί κάνετε 
τις στοιχειώδεις εργασίες και τις αναθέσεις, πώς να τις κάνετε 
καλά και πώς να πάρετε ένα ακόμα καλύτερο σημάδι την επόμενη 
φορά γύρω από.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4042</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)

        <educational>

          </intendedEndUserRole>

          <language>en</language>

          </typicalAgeRange>

        <rights>

            <source>costValues</source>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>

FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
